column1: WRT/0335/17, formed the opinion that the petitioner did not possess the title when
he claimed a permit and held that the 3rd respondent namely  Sunil Weerasinghe
former Commissioner General of Agrarian Development had issued a false permit
without any basis for such an issuance.

F
or  the  said  reasons,  we  revise  and  set  aside  the  decision  made  by  the  learned

e direct the Registrar to send this order along with the original Case record for
